00019 class Guid {
00020     public:
00021         UINT32 data1;
00022         UINT16 data2;
00023         UINT16 data3;
00024         UINT8  data4[8];
00025 
00026         BOOLEAN operator == (const Guid& guid) const {
00027             return memcmp(this, &guid, sizeof(Guid)) == 0;
00028         }
00029 
00030         BOOLEAN operator != (const Guid& guid) const {
00031             return memcmp(this, &guid, sizeof(Guid)) != 0;
00032         }
00033 };

00088 template<class T> class ServicePtr {
00089     public:
00090         ServicePtr() : m_p(0) {}
00091         ServicePtr(Service *serv_ptr) : m_p((T*)serv_ptr) {}
00092 
00093         void Init(Service *serv_ptr) {
00094             m_p = (T*)serv_ptr;
00095         }
00096 
00097         T* operator->() const {
00098             return m_p;
00099         }
00100 
00101         ServicePtr<T> operator=(const Service *s) {
00102             m_p = (T*) s;
00103             return *this;
00104         }
00105 
00106         BOOLEAN operator !=(const ServicePtr<T>& s) const {
00107             return m_p != s.m_p;
00108         }
00109 
00110         BOOLEAN operator ==(const ServicePtr<T>& s) const {
00111             return m_p == s.m_p;
00112         }
00113 
00114         T& operator*() {
00115             return *m_p;
00116         }
00117 
00118     private:
00119         T *m_p;
00120 };
